projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.details: As my first solo project, I created a basic portfolio site to display some imformation about me, a link to view and download my CV, all the ways of contacting me aswell as some info about my projects. </br>This website is easily updateable as I created json data that holds all of my projects in it and used JS to fetch that data and siaply it on my projects page. This way I can easily add new projects to my page. This is my first time bulding something without any templates or designs provided.
